entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as the one who is sliding from her thestral and marching over to Harry, Hermione, and Ginny.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one whom Luna is approaching along with Hermione and Ginny.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is being approached by Luna, along with Harry and Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one who is being approached by Luna, along with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: thestral
entities.description: Thestral is mentioned as the mount from which Luna is sliding down to approach Harry, Hermione, and Ginny.

relationships.description: Luna is mounted on the thestral from which she slides down to approach Harry, Hermione, and Ginny.
Luna is approaching Harry along with Hermione and Ginny.
Luna is approaching Hermione along with Harry and Ginny.
Luna is approaching Ginny along with Harry and Hermione.
